Common.LocationDescription.Common.Text: Located at The Rise @ Oxley, the two-storey commercial podium has a total strata area of 16,459 sf and a share value of 28% out of the entire development.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
CBRE, as the exclusive marketing agent, is pleased to present for sale a rarely available freehold 2-storey commercial podium located in between Orchard Road and CBD. 
Located at The Rise @ Oxley, the two-storey commercial podium has a total strata area of 16,459 sf and a share value of 28% out of the entire development. It enjoys excellent visibility and has over 80-metre wide road frontage along Oxley Rise. All units on the ground floor is approved for F&B use.
The property has excellent accessibility and is within short walking distance to Dhoby Ghaut and Somerset MRT Station. It is located in close proximity to various commercial developments, residential estates and educational institutions.
This is an exceptional opportunity for an investor or owner occupier to acquire a well-located, freehold commercial podium with excellent visibility and potential signage rights.
The sale will be conducted through an Expression of Interest (EOI) exercise which closes on Thursday, 12 March 2020, at 3pm.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Freehold Retail Podium Near Orchard with Excellent Frontage

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Well known among the locals as the go-to place for hi-end audio equipment, The Adelphi is a mixed-use 10-storey development in the heart of City Hall. The basement level of the retail podium, where the subject property is located, features a myriad of F&B offerings that are popular among office workers within The Adelphi and nearby office developments.
